Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.gaussian.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous, AnalyticNullDistributionComputer, EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer
    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
implements AnalyticNullDistributionComputer
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Gaussian Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements an AIS calculator using model of Gaussian variables with linear interactions. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian as the calculator into the parent class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, with:

    • The constructor step being a simple call to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorGaussian().
    • setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF and those of the super-class as outlined in ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String)), including auto-embedding properties.
    • Computed values are in nats, not bits!

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian

    • Field Detail

      • MI_CALCULATOR_GAUSSIAN

        public static final java.lang.String MI_CALCULATOR_GAUSSIAN

      • PROP_MAX_CORR_AIS_NUM_SURROGATES

        public static final java.lang.String PROP_MAX_CORR_AIS_NUM_SURROGATES
        Property name for the number of surrogates to use in computing the bias correction if required for the ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_MAX_CORR_AIS auto embedding method. Defaults to 0 meaning that we use analytic bias correction rather than empirical surrogates. Note: This is not used for bias correction of the raw values, only for auto-embedding
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • auto_embed_num_surrogates

        protected int auto_embed_num_surrogates
        Internal variable for storing the number of surrogates to use for the auto-embedding ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_MAX_CORR_AIS method. 0 mean we use analytic approaches rather than surrogates.

    • Method Detail

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                        java.lang.String propertyValue)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets properties for the AIS Gaussian calculator. New property values are not guaranteed to take effect until the next call to an initialise method.

        Valid property names, and what their values should represent, include:

        • PROP_MAX_CORR_AIS_NUM_SURROGATES -- number of surrogates to use to compute the bias correction in the auto-embedding if the property ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.PROP_AUTO_EMBED_METHOD has been set to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.AUTO_EMBED_METHOD_MAX_CORR_AIS. Defaults to 0 meaning that we use analytic bias correction. Note: this is not used for other bias-correction, only inside auto-embedding
        • Any properties accepted by {@link super#setProperty(String, String)}
        • Or properties accepted by the underlying MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian.setProperty(String, String) implementation.
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous
        Overrides:
        setProperty in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of the property
        propertyValue - value of the property.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem with the supplied value).

      • computeSignificance

        public ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution computeSignificance()
                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Generate an analytic distribution of what the AIS would look like, under a null hypothesis that our variables had no relation. This is performed without bootstrapping (which is done in #computeSignificance(int, int) and #computeSignificance(int, int[][])). The method is implemented using the corresponding method of the underlying MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateGaussian

        See Section II.E "Statistical significance testing" of the JIDT paper below, and the other papers referenced in AnalyticNullDistributionComputer.computeSignificance() (in particular Brillinger and Geweke), for a description of how this is done for MI. Basically, the null distribution is a chi-square distribution.

        Specified by:
        computeSignificance in interface AnalyticNullDistributionComputer
        Returns:
        ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution object which describes the proportion of AIS scores from the null distribution which have higher or equal AISs to our actual value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        "J.T. Lizier, 'JIDT: An information-theoretic toolkit for studying the dynamics of complex systems', 2014."
